Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock hit the tournament's joint-fastest half-century off 22 balls
David Miller provided the impetus in the latter half of South Africa's innings with 43 off 28
Harry Brook made 53, and Liam Livingstone, with 33 off 17 balls, had the chase in control for England
Kagiso Rabada and Anrich Nortje dismissed England in the last three overs
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram said, 'The bowlers came back, it shows a lot of skill and shows the fight inside.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Hope hit 82 from 39 balls as the West Indies beat the United States by nine wickets
Shai Hope hit the tournament's joint-fastest half-century off 22 balls
Shai Hope hit a six from the fifth ball of the 11th over
Roston Chase took a career-best 3-19 and Andre Russell 3-31 as the West Indies limited the United States to 128 in 19.5 overs
Shai Hope finished the chase with a six from the fifth ball of the 11th over
Others: South Africa's win streak was extended to six games
South Africa is a firm favorite for the semifinals
England suffered its first loss in the Super Eight
Shai Hope was added to the West Indies' lineup for Friday's match as an injury replacement for Brandon King
West Indies fans partied under the Friday night lights
